https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kMnMjYdZp7nszLCeZZKHrHHHN3s.jpg In this classic retro horror thriller, Sam, an aspiring writer, takes a job as a clerk in an L.A. inner city grocery market owned by the sinister Dr. Munoz, a former scientist who claims to have a rare skin condition. Chill
